channel.title: Retirement on Kevin's corner of the web
channel.description: Recent content in Retirement on Kevin's corner of the web

item.title: Putting My Second Act Into Perspective
item.description: Putting My Second Act into Perspective Six months ago I retired after forty years of nursing practice. One of the things I was told when I retired was that I would get bored within three months. Uh. No. As I told a former co-worker, I’m busier now than when I was working. The difference is that I’m doing what interests me, what I want to do, rather than what I’m required to do by someone else.
